memberdef.name: find_bounds_loop
memberdef.initializer: x_min = point2->pos.x; \ x_max = point2->pos.x; \ \ this_point = point1; \ do { \ x_min = MIN (this_point->pos.x, x_min); \ x_max = MAX (this_point->pos.x, x_max); \ this_point = this_point->next; \ } \ while (this_point != point2 && this_point != point1) \
